âœ… Correct: A. Statements (1) and (2) are false (statement (3) is true).
Why the false statements are false:
- (1) A rights offering gives existing shareholders the right to buy new shares (typically to maintain their proportional ownership).
- (2) Rights offerings are designed to protect existing shareholders (they receive rights); any discount is typically captured by existing shareholders who exercise or sell the rights.
